programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep57
programme.desc: War of the Cheeks - Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep58
programme.desc: Techy Tykes - Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep4
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure - climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Parental Stridence - When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Flopping of the Bullruses - Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Follow the Lightning: Part 1 - Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D'Angelo and Alex.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Follow the Lightning: Part 2 - Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Fire Escape - Tom hatches an unorthodox plan to use a monstrous Nightmare to test Alex's new fire suits that endangers the secret of dragons.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Battle - D-Structs becomes super-charged when Skrap-It installs a special spark bug, so the Trux must find their own spark bug to battle D-Structs' new power

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Cementasaurs - Ty is pushed into a quicksand-like pool of wet cement by the wild Cementasaurs, and it's up to the Reptoolsto quickly rescue him before he sinks

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Crow Pox,Faking Ammends - A prank leads to "crow pox" for the FAST snails, who make a treacherous climb to find a cure, Burn and her hippie sister try to end their rivalry.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Deuce Is Wild,To Fire A Squire - Whiplash tries to scare Deuce and Edvard straight, but the plan backfires, After Turbo saves his life, Buster Move waits on Turbo's every need.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Uh-Oh, Canada - The Wanderers and Whitebeard visit Wizard Blizzardbeard in Quebec City, Canada, for the big Wanderers Ice Hockey Tournament. When Odlulu uses the Invisibility Key on herself and Fritz, they become an unstoppable, invisible hockey-playing duo. Wally and Wenda must pursue Odlulu on the rink and throughout Quebec City to retrieve the Invisibility Key.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Blue Moon Over Argentina - Odlulu takes the Guitar Key from Wizard Melodia in order to be the best guitar player in Buenos Aires. Only problem is that the Guitar Key is what Wizard Melodia plays the guitar to control the rising & setting of the blue moon every 2.5 years. Wally and Wenda head to Argentina to help Wizard Melodia get the Guitar Key back and put Buenos Aires back to normal.

programme.desc: Andy and the Blue Duck Chicks - In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to New Zealand on a baby animal mission to help rescue a family of blue ducks and their chicks from a fast flowing river. Along the way, Andy takes a ride on a pukeko chick and meets a hedgehog.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Mission: Fireworks Night - It's Fireworks Night and therapy dog Toffee is helping his neighbour Tilly, who is a bit worried about all the loud bangs and whizzes.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Vulture and Brittlestar - In this episode we meet the vulture and the brittlestar. Their wild connection is that they are both super scavengers.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep16
programme.desc: The Swashbuckle Seven Seas - In this episode Seaweed starts to daydream about the Swashbuckle Seven Seas.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep32
programme.desc: The Voice Badge - When the Squirrels start talking to each other in the wrong voices it's clear something has gone awry. But Duggee has his voice badge. He knows what to do!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep31
programme.desc: The Stick Badge - Duggee and the squirrels prepare for a campfire by collecting sticks of all sizes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep30
programme.desc: The Colour Badge - Duggee is painting in his favourite colouring book. The Squirrels want to have a go too.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Ilulissat, Greenland - Grandmaster Glitch has travelled to Ilulissat in Greenland to show his teddy, Cuddles, the sights. But Cuddles ends up getting stuck in the snow!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Horsetail Fall, California - The team are at Horsetail Fall in the Yosemite Nation Park to watch the 300m high waterfall become Firefall. Can the team save snowy Princess Glorinda and Firefall at the Yosemite National park?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep1
programme.desc: Emily's Best Friend - Emily worries that she doesn't have a best friend. Soon she realises she's been surrounded by best friends all along.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Birthday Buoy - Sarah, Duck and Flamingo arrange a nautical surprise for John's birthday.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Alarm Cluck - Duck keeps oversleeping, so Sarah decides he needs his own alarm clock.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Bell - The Town Hall clock is broken, it's lost its Ding Dong. It will take hours to fix, so Stanley asks noisy Fred if he will shout "DING DONG" when the big hand is pointing up.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Bus-Train - Cynthia is working on the bus so asks Stanley to take her passengers to the community centre. He uses Amare's tractor and trailer, his car, a boat, and a bath to make a Bus-Train.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Rainy Day - Monty wonders whether there is a way to have fun outside, even when it's raining.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep37
programme.desc: It's Time for a Folk Tale - JoJo, Gran Gran and the Nature Club hear a special folk tale about a spider named Anansi.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Born Yesterday - Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Mini Bluey - When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Unicorse - Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep35
programme.desc: The Brave Banana Badge - When thunder and lightning scares the squirrels, Duggee teaches them about bravery.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep34
programme.desc: The Sleeping Badge - Tag is having trouble sleeping, so Duggee offers him a few tricks to help him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Calm Down - Water, water, everywhere - there's a flood in our hospital soap opera! Grown-up Tag the firefighter splashes around. It's a good job grown-up Happy the lifeguard is on hand

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Mud Volcano, Azerbaijan - Glitch's plan to use methane gas from a mud volcano to power Lars's new machine has explosive results! Can the bickering pair stop a huge fire and save the Grimbots?

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Pak Choi - Pak Choi, who might be known by many names, sings about how she's "Always Pak To You!"

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Mango - It's wish-granter Mango, ready to make all the Roots and Fruits cast wishes come true.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Tin Can Games - It's the Tin Can Games and Evil Pea wants to win the Tin Can Trophy. She cheats in the final race by putting a magnet on Supertato's back to stop him from going super fast.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Tablet Takeover - The Veggies are delighted with a new tablet they've found. When they're not looking, Evil Pea turns the tablet to evil mode. Soon the tablet takes over the supermarket.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep78
programme.desc: Up Down, Down Up - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po drive the Tubby Car to the Hidey Hup where they discover the Tubby Uppy Downy. They have fun going up down, down up!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep18
programme.desc: Van - Dee encourages a friend to say 'van' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different vans - a yellow van, a white van, a big van and even a veggie van.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep45
programme.desc: Hooper's Big Bake - On today's poptastic adventure, Hooper and Fly are making a spectacular jelly cake. But when Hooper tries to do too much too quickly, will the cake hold together?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep12
programme.desc: A Touch of the Fogs - Everyone in OKIDO is getting ready to watch the dolphins dance at Vivienne Volcano's island, but the island is covered in cloud.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Relax - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Exercise - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Master of Puppets - At Squirrel Club, there's a story told in blocks, the tale of a first tooth, a fable about changing emotions, and a yarn involving the Squirrels as puppets.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Potato Time - At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep16

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep8
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
